name: Philadelphia International Airport - A Five-Minute Tour
description:
Welcome back to another five-minute terminal tour; this time, we're at Philadelphia International Airport (PHL). 

This annotated tour takes you through each of PHL's six terminals, sharing helpful information and trivia about one of the busiest airports in the country. 

Whether you're traveling through Philly and want some pointers, or you'd like to experience the sights and sounds of an everyday airport experience, here's everything you need to know about PHL in five minutes.

Enjoy and be sure to subscribe for more travel videos!

Thumbnail by my wife Beth! 
Instagram at bethmclain.art
